title: How many geoglyphs have been identified around the world and why are they only visible from the sky? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are a lot of geoglyphs. No numbers are available. They are not only visible from the sky. Here’s a geoglyph of Genghis Khan on a hill in Mongolia visible from the ground:  The ones “only visible from the sky” are visible from the ground too. You just don’t see the whole picture because it’s so large. For example, the Uffington White Horse is only fully seen from above  When viewed from ground level, you can only see parts of it, and would not recognize the intended picture  By Ethan Doyle White, CC BY-SA 3.0, File:The head of the White Horse of Uffington.jpg
